Label: ResponseId
Key: a random string that Qualtrics assigned every participant

Label: age
Key: participant age

Label: gender
Key: participant gender identity

Label: churched
Key: How often do you go to church?
Scale: Never to More than once a week

Label: church_type
Key: What kind of church do you go to?

Label: importance_rel
Key: My faith/religion/spirituality is important to me.

Label: freq_prayer
Key: How often do you spontaneously pray by yourself?

Label: importance_pray
Key: Prayer is an important part of my faith life.

Label: previous
Key: I have prayed about this particular situation before.
Scale: Not at all to A great deal

Label: problem_articulation
Key: I understand the situation I am facing better as a result of praying about it.

Label: closer
Key: I am closer to solving the conflict with this person.

Label: ideas
Key: I have new ideas or a new plan for how to solve this conflict with this person going forward.

Label: plan
Key: I have a clear sense of what action I should take in this conflict with this person going forward.

Label: motivation
Key: I am motivated to resolve conflict with this person after praying about the situation.

Label: optimism
Key: I am optimistic that there is a resolution to this conflict after praying about the situation.

Label: connected
Key: I feel more connected to the person after praying about the situation.

Label: positive
Key: I feel more positively towards the person after praying about the situation.

Label: charity
Key: I feel more charitable towards the person after praying about the situation.

Label: relief
Key: I feel a sense of relief after praying about the situation.

Label: result
Key: I think something will change with this person as a result of praying about the situation.

Label: condition
Key: prayer or talk

Label: condition_num
Key: 0 (prayer) or 1 (talk)
